page.title: 09Recreation Gymnastics.
page.content: Every Monday, Tuesday, Friday and Saturday I go to Glan Y Mor School for gymnastic training. We train for 2\ hours _ 18 00 till 20 30. We all start with warming up exercises,like running around,splits,and leg swinging. Then I move on to the bars and do my sequence three times. I then perform another sequence on the beam which I do three times.On the vault I practise ten long arms,half on's and half off's. The three tumbling exercises on the floor are round off, flick and straight. For my second one I do round off, flick, whip, flick,tuck.My third one is round off,flick,tuck. Then just before we finish, we do strengthening exercises such as press ups, v.sits, squats and back lifts. These I do thirty times each. As a result of hard work I have been chosen to represent The West Wales Gymnastic Team and Wales.
